month.definition: each of the twelve named periods into which a year is divided
month.example: Her birthday is in the month of June.

major.example: The company announced a major breakthrough in cancer research.

star.definition: a fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun
star.example: You can see the stars clearly on a dark night.

areas.definition: a region or part of a town, a country, or the world
areas.example: The company plans to expand its operations to new areas.

future.definition: the time or a period of time following the moment of speaking or writing; time regarded as still to come
future.example: We need to plan for the future.

space.definition: a continuous area or expanse which is free, available, or unoccupied
space.example: The new design gives us more space in the kitchen.
